text: Meeting with Sri Lankan Foreign Minister Ravi Karunanayake yesterday (22nd June) at the Foreign Ministry, he wished the minister on his new appointment.The two parties paid attention on strengthening investments between the two countries and the Foreign Minister appreciated the support extended by Turkey.The floor has been opened to improve trade relations between Sri Lanka and Turkey, said Turkey Ambassador in Sri Lanka Tunca Ozcuhadar. title: Turkey Ambassador meets Foreign Minister
